meanings.definition: A narrow band worn around the head to hold the hair in place.
meanings.sent1: She wore a colorful bandeau to keep her hair away from her face.
meanings.sent2: The gymnast used a black bandeau to keep her hair neat during her routine.
meanings.sent3: The silly clown tried to juggle while balancing a bandeau on his head.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like a tangled bandeau, all over the place and hard to control.
meanings.sent5: The bright red bandeau stood out against her dark hair, a vivid contrast.

meanings.definition: A garment consisting of a strip of cloth that covers the breasts.
meanings.sent1: She chose a lacy bandeau to wear under her sheer top.
meanings.sent2: The fashion model confidently strutted down the runway in a stylish bandeau.
meanings.sent3: The cat somehow managed to get a bandeau stuck on its head, looking quite ridiculous.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a colorful bandeau, spreading joy wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The delicate lace bandeau hugged her curves, enhancing her outfit beautifully.
